name: sorting-hat-slack
description: Want to quickly sort yourself into a Hogwarts House on Slack? Think that friend is really a Slytherin not a Gryffindor, but want a little magical confirmation from a sentient hat? Just use the `/sortinghat` slash command! Type your the slash command followed by a name of the witch or wizard to be sorted. Sorting Hat bot responds with a short rhyme and the banner of the selected House.
author: Elizabeth Lovero
